description: TEHRAN - In a statement posted on X, Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi noted that his country's Tuesday attack against Israeli positions in the occupied territories, which followed a series of Israeli assassinations of Resistance leaders - one on Iranian soil, was a legitimate exercise of self-defence under Article 51 of the UN Charter.
title: Araqchi highlights 'self-defence' in IRGC strikes against Israel

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Foreign Ministry released a statement late on Tuesday night concerning the defensive measures taken by its armed forces against the Zionist regime of Israel.
title: Iran affirms right to self-defense in face of Israeli aggression

description: TEHRAN - The General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Islamic Republic of Iran, the country's most senior military body, has backed the IRGC's Tuesday operation against Israel, adding that more decisive action will ensue if the regime makes more hostile and illegal moves.
title: Iran Armed Forces praises Operation True Promise II, warns of further action

description: TEHRAN - Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah, one of the most powerful Arab figures in the Middle East, has left a lasting mark on modern Lebanon, the Arab-Israel conflict and the wider region.
title: Who was Hassan Nasrallah?

description: TEHRAN – The Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) rained tens of missiles at Israeli positions in the occupied territories on Tuesday, responding to a series of terrorist attacks by the regime that killed Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh, Hezbollah chief Sayyad Hassan Nasrallah, and IRGC commander Brigadier General Abbas Nilforooshan.
title: We're ready

description: TEHRAN - Israel’s military spokesperson Daniel Hagari claimed the Israeli Occupation Forces (IOF) conducted "limited and targeted raids" across the Lebanese border in what he described as “localized ground raids’’.
title: Hezbollah ready for ground invasion

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Defense Minister has warned that further operations against Israel will be carried out with increased intensity if the Zionist regime continues its aggression.
title: Iran DM says 'intensified operations' await Israel if regime's aggression continues

description: TEHRAN - Western hypocrisy is not just outrageous, but extremely dangerous and can lead to serious consequences, says Iran's Vice President for Strategic Affairs Mohammad Javad Zarif.
title: 'Western hypocrisy dangerous', says Zarif as he condemns Western reaction to Iran's retaliation

description: TEHRAN - Western hypocrisy is not just outrageous, but extremely dangerous and can lead to serious consequences, says Iran's Vice President for Strategic Affairs Mohammad Javad Zarif.
title: 'Western hypocrisy dangerous', Zarif condemns West's reaction to Operation True Promise II

description: TEHRAN - Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian has stated that Iran's military actions against Israel were carried out in accordance with its legitimate rights and with the goal of ensuring peace and security for both Iran and the broader region.
title: Iran’s attack on Israel in accordance with legitimate rights: Pezeshkian

description: TEHRAN - In its retaliatory military strikes on Israel late on Tuesday night the Iranian military targeted the Netzarim military facility and the  Tel Nof intelligence unit.
title: Iran hits Israel's Netzarim military facility and Tel Nof intelligence unit

description: TEHRAN- The inaugural joint ground exercise involving the armies of Iran and Oman has started.
title: Iran, Oman conduct first joint ground military exercise

description: TEHRAN - Javad Agheipour’s brace helped steer Sepahan to a 4-0 win over FC Istiklol in their AFC Champions League Two 2024/25 Group C tie on Tuesday.
title: Sepahan defeat Istiklol in AFC Champions League Two 2024/25

description: TEHRAN – In a statement made during a visit to Hezbollah's office in Tehran on Tuesday, Ali Akbar Ahmadian, Secretary of Iran's Supreme National Security Council (SNSC), emphasized that Israel’s psychological warfare would not help it achieve victory over the Resistance Front.
title: Israeli psychological war will not yield victory over Resistance: Iran top security official

description: TEHRAN –Iran’s First Vice President, Mohammad Reza Aref, has arrived in Armenia to participate in the third edition of the Eurasian Economic Forum, as well as a meeting of the Eurasian Intergovernmental Council.
title: Iranian VP in Armenia to attend Eurasian Economic Forum

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s president extended his congratulations to Xi Jinping on the occasion of the seventy-fifth anniversary of the establishment of the People's Republic of China through a formal message.
title: Pezeshkian congratulates Xi Jinping on 75th founding anniversary

description: TEHRAN- The former chief commander of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps and current secretary of Iran’s Expediency Council has urged the United Nations Security Council to intervene and halt Netanyahu's aggressive actions in a region.
title: Former IRGC chief says UN Security Council must issue ultimatum to Zionist regime

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian deputy head of the Foreign Ministry for Legal and International Affairs calls for a UN General Assembly session to address Israel's activities in Lebanon and Palestine.
title: Iran urges UNGA to prioritize Palestine and Lebanon crises

description: TEHRAN- Ahmad Marvi, acting on behalf of the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, visited Tabas to assess the current situation following the recent mining disaster and to offer condolences and support to the victims' families.
title: Leader’s representative visits Tabas following deadly coal mine explosion

description: TEHRAN – In a series of coordinated terrorist attacks in Iran's southeastern Sistan and Baluchestan province, six individuals, including a local commander of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC), were killed.
title: Six killed in separate terrorist attacks in southeastern Iran

description: TEHRAN - In an analysis, Sobh-e-No wrote about the plan designed by the Zionist regime: "The new order" is a new code for Israel's crimes and is the continuation of the "greater Middle East" plan, which had already failed.
title: Delusions of a devil

description: MADRID – What are the points of convergence and divergence between the political ideologies of Hezbollah in Lebanon and the Islamic Revolution of Iran?
title: Hezbollah and Iran: a shared political vision

description: TEHRAN – In a statement issued by Iran's Permanent Mission to the United Nations, the Islamic Republic emphasized that its recent actions against Israel were a justified and measured response to the "terrorist actions" by the Zionist regime.
title: Iran’s UN mission warns of 'devastating response' if Israel escalates

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Islamic Revolution Guards Corps has fired missiles at Israel's Nevtim air base that houses Israel's F-35 fighter jets.
title: IRGC launches missiles at Israel's Nevatim air base

description: TEHRAN – The IRGC has warned that should the Zionist regime retaliate against Iran's operations, it would encounter severe and overwhelming attacks.
title: Iran to respond more severely in case of Israeli action: IRGC

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian military has started launching ballistic missiles at Israel in retaliation to a series of assassinations inside Iran and Lebanon.
title: Iran fires hundreds of missiles at occupied territories after series of Israeli assassinations

description: TEHRAN - The number of visitors to historical sites and cultural heritage museums in Hamedan province has seen a significant increase of nearly 18% during the first six months of the current Iranian year (stated on March 20).
title: Visits to Hamedan attractions see 18 percent year-on-year increase in H1

description: TEHRAN – Fars’ tourism chief has announced plans to restore and preserve parts of the historical core of Dosiran village, located in Kazerun county of the southern province.
title: Preservation plans unveiled for ancient village

description: TEHRAN – Hormozgan’s tourism chief has announced plans to expand the province’s aerial tourism infrastructure through private sector investment.
title: Aerial tourism to gain momentum in Hormozgan province

description: TEHRAN - On Tuesday, the University of Tehran hosted an international conference attended by prominent figures from the travel sector, including Iran’s tourism minister Seyyed Reza Salehi-Amiri, as well as some foreign ambassadors, diplomats and university professors.
title: Intl. conference highlights Iran as safe travel destination

description: TEHRAN - There was double joy for Iran on the first day of the World Taekwondo Junior Championships in Chuncheon, Korea as Parnian Noori and Aynaz Nasiri won two gold medals.
title: Iranian girls win two golds in World Taekwondo Junior Championships

description: TEHRAN- Iran's Islamic Culture and Relations Organization (ICRO) is set to host the Week of Asian Cultural Dialogues, focusing on the Persian language as a vital spiritual heritage, from October 4 to 9 in the cities of Neyshabur (Nishapur), Mashhad, and Tehran.
title: Iranian cities to host week of cultural dialogues celebrating Persian language heritage

description: TEHRAN-The latest album of the Iranian traditional singer Mohammad Motamedi “Intizar, Songs of Longing,” in which he collaborated with the jazz music ensemble Rembrandt Trio from the Netherlands, has been nominated for the annual awards 2024 by German Record Critics' Award.
title: Mohammad Motamedi’s album with Rembrandt Trio nominated at German Record Critics' Award

description: TEHRAN-Three short films from Iran will take part in the 15th Baku International Film Festival, due to be held in Baku, Azerbaijan, from October 4 to 8.
title: Three films from Iran to participate in Baku International Film Festival

description: TEHRAN- A Turkish translation of Persian poet Nezami Ganjavi’s “Haft Peykar” has recently been published by Bilge Publishing House in Turkey in collaboration with the Cultural Attaché of the Islamic Republic of Iran in Istanbul.
title: Turkish translation of Nezami's classic “Haft Peykar” published

description: TEHRAN –Addressing elites on Tuesday, President Masoud Pezeshkian sought their expertise in helping the government tackle extant challenges in the country.
title: Pezeshkian calls for elites to help government deal with problems

description: BEIJING- President Xi Jinping on Monday said the Chinese people will score more remarkable achievements and make greater contributions to the noble cause of peace and development of humanity.
title: Xi urges greater national achievements, contributions to humanity's peace, development

description: TEHRAN –A total of 1,000 Iranian and Afghan students in Khorasan Razavi and Fars provinces have participated in intensive remedial courses held through the cooperation of the ministry of education and the United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) to improve basic skills.
title: Iranian, Afghan students benefit from remedial classes

description: TEHRAN –Iranian Science, Research and Technology Minister, Hossein Sarraf, and Japanese Ambassador to Tehran, Tamaki Tsukada, have discussed avenues for boosting scientific and technological collaborations between the two countries.
title: Iran, Japan underscore need to expand sci-tech co-op

description: TEHRAN – Commemorated on October 1st each year, the International Day of Older Persons recognizes the contributions of senior citizens, raises public awareness about the challenges associated with aging populations, and highlights the needs to be met.
title: International Day of Older Persons: aging with dignity

description: The Lebanese resistance movement Hezbollah says it has targeted Israel's Glilot military base and Mossad headquarters on the outskirts of Tel Aviv with salvos of Fadi-4 rockets.
title: Hezbollah hits Mossad headquarters in ‘largest attack’

description: TEHRAN - Persepolis and Esteghlal, two of Iran's most decorated football clubs, have faced a disappointing start to their AFC Champions League Elite 2024/25 campaigns. Despite their domestic dominance in recent years, both teams have struggled to replicate their form on the continental stage, raising serious questions about their ability to compete at the highest level of Asian club football.
title: Iranian giants stumble in AFC Champions League

description: TEHRAN – The match between Iran’s Tractor and Indian side Mohun Bagan was canceled after the latter didn’t travel to Tabriz due to security concerns.
title: Tractor, Mohun Bagan match cancelled

description: TEHRAN - The highly anticipated and star-studded cast of nominees for the AFC Annual Awards Seoul 2023 was announced today, with just under a month left to the gala ceremony.
title: Iranians nominated for 2023 AFC Annual Awards

description: TEHRAN - The head of National Iranian Gas Transmission Company (NIGTC) has said that 99 percent of the country’s gas transmission equipment and facilities are domestically-made, noting that the country's gas industry is on the verge of complete self-sufficiency.
title: Iran 99% self-sufficient in manufacturing gas transmission equipment

description: TEHRAN – Governor of the Central Bank of Iran (CBI) Mohammadreza Farzin said the negotiations have begun for establishing a joint monetary channel among Islamic countries, Mehr News Agency reported.
title: OIC members discussing establishment of joint monetary channel among Islamic nations

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Minister of Finance and Economic Affairs Abdolnasser Hemmati and Russia's Minister of Economic Development Maxim Reshetnikov have called for strengthening economic ties between the two countries.
title: Tehran, Moscow call for strengthening economic ties

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Industry, Mining and Trade Minister Mohammad Atabak and Andrey Slepnev, the minister in charge of trade of the Eurasian Economic Commission (EEC), have discussed ways of expanding economic cooperation in a meeting on the sidelines of the Eurasian Business Forum in Armenia.
title: Iran, EAEU take new steps to expand trade relation

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Industry, Mining and Trade Minister Mohammad Atabak and Andrey Slepnev, the minister in charge of trade of the Eurasian Economic Commission (EEC), have discussed ways of expanding economic cooperation in a meeting on the sidelines of the Eurasian Business Forum in Armenia.
title: Iran, EAEU take new steps to expand trade relations

description: TEHRAN – Iran officially launched its trade center in Armenia’s capital Yerevan on Monday, IRNA reported.
title: Iran opens trade center in Yerevan

description: Hezbollah says it targeted Israeli troops across the border in Metula with artillery fire.
title: Hezbollah fires artillery at Israeli troops in Metula
Iran vows to respond to Israeli actions

description: The Israeli military has carried out deadly aerial assaults on southern Lebanon, killing several people, amid intensified attacks by the Tel Aviv regime against the Arab country.
title: 10 killed as Israel targets home in Lebanon’s Daoudiya
